channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-1724] camel-mail - sending mails with text/plain could give a content type error by java mail
item.summary: camel-mail - sending mails with text/plain could give a content type error by java mail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
On delivery attempt: 0 caught: org.springframework.mail.MailSendException; nested exceptions (1) are:
Failed message 1: javax.mail.MessagingException: IOException while sending message (javax.activation.UnsupportedDataTypeException: text/plain; charset=us-ascii)
